name: Astrogon
storyline: A self-taught French developer, A.K.A Thorsen, had a revelation during a dream. Geometric shapes, space, stars, a circle, and a cube appeared to him that leaps from wall to wall and from obstacle to obstacle, in a dream so strange, that he must have woken up in the middle of at night to take notes, draw up Astrogon's first sketches, with the odd feeling and certainty that this was his next craziest project. At the time he had this dream, Thorsen, the “dreamer developer”, was developing “Infinity Land”: a retro arcade game, inspired by Mario maker, with a creative mode and a particularly rich and promising universe.
summary:
ASTROGON is a challenging arcade game in an intergalactic synthwave universe.

SOLO MODE:
A world to be conquered in several dimensions:

Avoid the opposite color to stay alive, jump from wall to wall and obstacle to obstacle, until you find the exit to get teleported to the next level. Collect as many stars as possible and try to beat all the time records to become the master of the game. Try to conquer level after level, dimension after dimension, with patience, dexterity, and intelligence. Earn rare Skins with amazing auras and special effects: blazes, ghosts, clones, laser turbine, etc. !

THE CREATIVE MODE:
A parallel world of yours! Express your infinite creativity!

Astrogon allows you to create your own levels in the Creative Mode. Become the God of Astrogon, be smart, innovative and clever, challenge all Astrogon players to succeed and beat time records and collect stars.
Players from all over the world will access your creations and play the levels you invented.
You will be notified of their performance, receive likes, comments and replays!
Play levels created by players around the world, and browse popular, recent and featured levels. Watch replays, comment and like your favorite levels and replays.
